name: Smartwool Burgee Crew Socks - Unisex
description: Add some fun to your wardrobe with geometric designs and bright colours. The merino blend naturally regulates temperature and lets your feet breathe.Merino, nylon and spandex wicks sweat and manages temperature summer or winter.Virtually Seamless™ toe eliminates chafing and hot spots.Shred Shield technology reduces wear from the toes.Supportive arch brace hugs your foot for a snug fit.
